verbs.description: [ARG1: The cancellation of a meeting between Trump and Kim Jong - un] [V: is] [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARG2: a good start to the denuclearisation of the Korean peninsula] — political scientist Ian Bremmer said the rejection 's a big embarrassment for the president , no matter how he tries to spin it .
